editorialNotes.standard: Weâ€™re huge fans of The Athletic, which combines up-to-the-minute live scores and an unmatched level of in-depth reporting to provide a haven for sports supporters across leagues. Follow your favorite teams and reporters to read up on the latest news, then dive deep into The Athleticâ€™s original podcasts and live streams to become an expert.

editorialNotes.tagline: Replay full games with Game Pass
editorialNotes.standard: The ultimate app for any football fan, NFL Mobile offers an insanely robust experience from the preseason to the playoffs. A smartly designed interface puts the spotlight on colorful photos and videos, and breaking news is easy to navigate and share. The astoundingly long list of features includes drive charts, real-time scores, and live stat trackers. Plus, on-demand games, access to preseason games, and more all become available with purchase of the NFL Game Pass 2016 Subscription, so thereâ€™s always something new to watch, analyze, and read.

If you want to play fantasy sports, there areâ€”ahemâ€”leagues of apps to choose from. But we think ESPN Fantasy might be the MVP. Its minimal interface stays out of our way so we can focus on draft picks, trades, and managing our lineup. But the best part? ESPNâ€™s got mini-stories on all of the hot prospects. So the more time we spend actually using the app, the better our team ends up.
